metadata.feature_description: Display featured posts in a responsive card layout with customizable appearance

steps.action: Navigate to News page and view card layout
steps.expected: Posts should display in a card grid layout
steps.actual: Posts displayed in card layout with images, titles, descriptions visible in Latest section

steps.expected: Cards should display in single column layout
steps.actual: Cards displayed in single column layout appropriate for mobile viewport
Cards displayed in 2-column layout appropriate for tablet viewport
Cards displayed in 3-column grid layout at desktop width

steps.action: Examine post cards for required information
steps.expected: Cards should show title, description, date, author, and image
steps.actual: Post cards display title, truncated description, background image, date, and author information

steps.expected: Card should show hover effect with additional information
steps.actual: Card hover reveals overlay with full post title, description, date, and author details

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Navigate to post detail from card

steps.expected: Should navigate to the post detail page
steps.actual: Successfully navigated to post detail page showing full post content with title, date, tags, description, author, and social share buttons

steps.action: Attempt to mark posts as featured and verify featured section display
steps.expected: Featured posts should appear in dedicated Featured section with limit applied
steps.actual: Featured checkbox exists in post edit UI, but no posts appear in the dedicated Featured section (.publisher-featured) - the section renders but shows 0 cards

issues: Featured Posts section exists in code and DOM but displays no posts. The Featured checkbox in post edit UI appears to not persist changes to the database, preventing testing of featured post limits.

steps.expected: Cards should display background images from posts
steps.actual: Post cards display background images correctly, with gradient overlay for text readability

observations: The Featured Posts module (Featured.ascx) exists and renders on the News page, but shows no posts because no posts are marked as featured in the database.
Code in Featured.ascx.cs shows GetFeaturedPosts() is called, but returns empty results indicating no posts have IsFeatured=true.
The Featured checkbox exists in the post edit UI but changes do not appear to persist to the database.
Card view functionality (CardViewManager.js) works correctly for the 'Latest' posts section.
CSS responsive breakpoints at 640px function correctly, switching between desktop-card and mobile-card views.
FeaturedCardManager.js handles touch and click events for mobile featured cards, but could not be tested due to lack of featured posts.
Comment count display (Disqus integration) could not be tested as ShowNumberOfComments depends on Disqus being configured.
